title: Improper Platform Usage
description: Verify platform permissions and intents adhere to principle of least privilege.

title: Insecure Data Storage
description: Validate encrypted storage APIs and avoid plaintext sensitive data on device.

title: Insecure Communication
description: Ensure TLS pinning or CA validation to mitigate MITM risk.

title: Insecure Authentication
description: Test biometric, token, and password flows for bypass resistance.

title: Insufficient Cryptography
description: Check key management, random number usage, and deprecation of weak algorithms.

title: Insecure Authorization
description: Exercise role enforcement and server-side checks for API requests.

title: Client Code Quality
description: Review code for memory corruption, WebView exposure, and logic errors.

title: Code Tampering
description: Assess tamper detection and runtime integrity controls.

title: Reverse Engineering
description: Confirm obfuscation strategy and monitor for leaked symbols or debug code.

title: Extraneous Functionality
description: Audit for debug menus, staging endpoints, and leftover test credentials.
